entry.def: A footer is text such as a name or page number that can be automatically displayed at the bottom of each page of a printed document.

example.ex: Page Mode shows headers, footers, footnotes and page numbers.

means.word_mean: 1. (used only in combinations) the height or length of something in feet;
2. a person who travels by foot
3. a printed note placed below the text on a printed page
